title: LoyceV
author: LoyceV
content: This is new:This morning, I received 2 PMs, both with this warning. One of them links to BPIP.org, the other has an URL within code-tags. I'm not sure what triggers the warning, but if it's added to "normal" PMs too, users will just dismiss it after seeing it many times.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Nothing special for triggering this warning, it's displayed almost in all the links. I have received a PM with 3 different links. Most of them were linked to bitcointalk. The other 2 were telegram and discord. Still having the same warning.Well, theymos can manually whitelist a few links for which the warning won't be visible.Quote from: LoyceV on February 19, 2023, 06:31:30 AMThis is new:Did you mean the feature or the warning message?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 19, 2023, 06:40:37 AMDid you mean the feature or the warning message?Both: I've never seen it before. The only warning I knew is this one:Quote!!! WARNING: This user is a newbie. If you are expecting a message from a more veteran member, then this is an imposter !!!

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 19, 2023, 06:40:37 AMNothing special for triggering this warning, it's displayed almost in all the links. I have received a PM with 3 different links. Most of them were linked to bitcointalk. The other 2 were telegram and discord. Still having the same warning.Well, theymos can manually whitelist a few links for which the warning won't be visible.Quote from: LoyceV on February 19, 2023, 06:31:30 AMThis is new:Did you mean the feature or the warning message?I guess when in a PM there are outbound links then it's showing the warning. Send a PM with forum link and another with an external link. The PM containing external link will display the warning to the receiver.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on February 19, 2023, 06:44:53 AMBoth: I've never seen it before. The only warning I knew is this one:You aren't using the forum PM system a huge, or maybe you didn't receive a such PM for a while. It has been there for a quite long time now, I noticed that on April 2022. It must be there prior to my post. I'm not surprised that you didn't notice. AI fact  Edit- Once again, AI fact. You have merited my post back then

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 19, 2023, 06:50:22 AMI noticed that on April 2022~Edit- Once again, AI fact. You have merited my post back then  You're right. So I guess it's just a coincidence seeing this in both PMs this morning. I'll lock this topic.In my defence: I've Merited more posts than I can remember.
